innhold.avsnitt: If you are the father or co-mother of the child, you may in some cases be eligible for a lump-sum grant. This may apply:

liste.punkt: for each child you adopt alone
if you have transferred parental responsibility or if the other parent dies
when you are granted parental responsibility
if you within 56 weeks after the child is born or adopted, have taken care of the child with the intent of acquiring the sole parental responsibility
